story.title: AFP Graphics Advisory
story.summary: Wednesday's graphics:- INTERNATIONAL -BRITAIN-EU-BREXIT-POLITICS: Key events in the Brexit process in 2019. 135 x 80 mmPAKISTAN-QUAKE: Map locating a 5.2-magnitude earthquake struck near the Kashmiri city of Mirpur in Punjab province, in Pakistan. 45 x 45 mmUN-CLIMATE:* Latest:- Updated map locating protests planned during Global Climate Action Week (Sept 20-27). 180 x 107 mm - Forecasts for Arctic sea ice melt comparing two scenarios: a) substantial worldwide push to curb carbon emissions,...

xmlText.p: Wednesday's graphics:
BRITAIN-EU-BREXIT-POLITICS: Key events in the Brexit process in 2019. 135 x 80 mm
PAKISTAN-QUAKE: Map locating a 5.2-magnitude earthquake struck near the Kashmiri city of Mirpur in Punjab province, in Pakistan. 45 x 45 mm
UN-CLIMATE:
* Latest:
- Updated map locating protests planned during Global Climate Action Week (Sept 20-27). 180 x 107 mm

- Forecasts for Arctic sea ice melt comparing two scenarios: a) substantial worldwide push to curb carbon emissions, and b) countries focus on domestic concerns at the expense of international efforts to curb global warming. 180 x 95 mm
- Switzerland's Pizol glacier disappears. 90 x 65 mm
* National efforts:
- Top five greenhouse gas emitting countries, 2016. 135 x 175 mm; 135 x 120 mm
- Where different countries stand in their efforts to become carbon neutral. 135 x 108 mm
- Earth Overshoot Day. 90 x 118 mm
* Sea level rise:
- Risk of submersion in five major coastal cities. 180 x 83 mm
- Sea level rise forecasts to 2100, with contributions from different areas. 135 x 99 mm
* Temperature rise:
- Projected global temperature rise by 2100, based on new climate models. 90 x 80 mm
- Difference between recorded monthly temperatures and the 20th-century average for the corresponding month. 180 x 95 mm
- Difference between recorded annual temperatures and the 20th-century average for the corresponding year. 90 x 61 mm
- Maps showing the forecast temperature rise in selected cities in 2050. 90 x 85 mm
* Miscellaneous:
- The multiple effects of climate change on human health and living conditions. 135 x 199 mm
- Municipal waste recycling rate in 2017 in Europe. 90 x 85 mm
CHINA-POLITICS-ANNIVERSARY:
- Graphic showing how China fares on major international rankings. 180 x 120 mm
- Factfile on the PRC which marks its 70th anniversary on October 1. 135 x 236 mm
- Graphic timeline of major events during 70 years of China's communist rule. 180 x 223 mm
- Factfile on China's main economic indicators. 135 x 100 mm

SKOREA-NKOREA-DMZ: Map of the Demilitarized Zone that has divided the Korean peninsula since 1953. South Korean President Moon Jae-in on Tuesday proposed that the UN create an "international peace zone" to replace the divide. 180 x 110 mm
IRAN-SAUDI-OIL:
- Map locating major air and naval bases in the Gulf region. 135 x 131 mm
- Key dates in Iran-US tensions, since the Iranian revolution in 1979. 180 x 102 mm
BRAZIL-DEFORESTATION:
- The rate of deforestation in the Brazilian Amazon in km2 since 1988. 135 x 80 mm
- Loss of forest cover and Co2 emissions between 2001 and 2018 in the countries of the Amazon Basin. 105 x 135 mm
SPAIN-POLITICS-FRANCO: Map locating Valle de los Caidos (Valley of the Fallen) near Madrid. 180 x 126 mm; 45 x 62 mm
SKOREA-CHINA-ANIMAL: Map showing parts of Asia, where African swine fever spread has led to millions of pigs being culled since August 2018, as of Sep 24, 2019. 90 x 76 mm
UN-POLITICS: The UN General Assembly on September 23-27. 90 x 76 mm
ISRAEL-VOTE:
- The incoming Israeli parliament. 90 x 86 mm
- Socio-economic factfile on Israel. 180 x 94 mm
HISTORY-WALL-30YEARS:
- Map of Europe showing the Iron Curtain and various Cold War political and military pacts across Europe. 135 x 152 mm
- Description of what a portion of the Berlin Wall was like in 1983. 135 x 75 mm
DRCONGO-HEALTH-EBOLA:
- Map showing Ebola epidemic, number of cases and deaths in DR Congo and neighbouring Uganda. 90 x 90 mm
- Toll and chronology of the ebola epidemic in the Democratic Republic of Congo and neighbouring countries. 45 x 132 mm
INDIA-MUMBAI-CLIMATE: Factfile on how India's biggest metropolis is vulnerable to sea-level rise. 90 x 151 mm
USA-SPACE-MOON: Graphic on NASA's Artemis program to establish a mini-space station orbiting the Moon before landing on the surface in 2024. 135 x 104 mm
FRANCE-FERTILITY:
- Factfile on fertility treatment in France. 90 x 100 mm
- Egg and sperm donations as a share of all fertility treatment in France. 45 x 105 mm
BRITAIN-CHINA-LEISURE:
- Map showing where British travel firm Thomas Cook and its subsidiaries operated with the number of tourists present or abroad in selected countries. 180 x 120 mm
- Map showing where British travel firm Thomas Cook and its subsidiaries operated, based on the company's annual report in 2018. 135 x 104 mm
- Mini-profile of British travel firm Thomas Cook which declared bankruptcy on Monday. 45 x 106
EU-DEBT:
- Public debt as a percentage of GDP for countries in the European Union. 135 x 125 mm
-Public debt in Italy, France, Spain and Germany in % of GDP from 2005 to 2018, and forecasts from 2019 and 2020. 135 x 105 mm
VOLLEY-EURO: A chart of the final rounds of the men's 2019 European Volleyball Championship. 135 x 62 mm
ATHLETICS-BERLIN-MARATHON: Graphic showing marathon world records for men and women, ahead of the 2019 Berlin Marathon on September 29. 135 x 247
RUGBYU-WC-2019:
- Factfile on top teams and their performance in the opening games. 180 x 158 mm
- Match calendar with results and Pool standings. 180 x 175 mm
- Fiji-Uruguay matches on Sept 5. 45 x 37 mm
- Pool standings. Pools A-D. 45 x 62 mm each
- The New Zealand haka. 135 x 194 mm
- Match calendars. Overall (Sept 20-Nov 2): 296 x 188 mm; All pools: 180 x 133 mm. Individual pools: 45 x 126 mm each
- Team members and past performance for each participating team. Each 90 mm wide
- List of players for each of the 20 teams. 90 x 100 mm
- Star player for each team. 45 x 86 mm
- Venues. 90 x 140 mm
- Stadium capacities. 180 x 172 mm
- Changes in physique of rugby players by position since 1955. 90 x 85 mm
- Changes in world rankings between 2015 and 2019. 45 x 60 mm
- Basic rules of rugby. 90 x 140 mm
- A brief history of rugby union. 135 x 117 mm
- Referees and match signals. 180 x 104 mm
FBL-FIFA-AWARDS: Graphic on the main winners at the FIFA Best Awards 2019. 135 x 138 mm
AUTO-F1-RUS:
- Sochi circuit for the Russian Grand Prix. 45 x 65 mm, 90 x 85 mm
- Driver and team standings with the Sochi circuit for the Russian Grand Prix. 135 x 85 mm
FBL-EUR-C1:
- Clubs that have won the European Champions League since 2010. 45 x 73 mm
- Map of Europe detailing past winners of the Champions League. 135 x 135 mm
- Clubs that have played the most European Cup football matches. 180 x 190 mm
FBL-ENG-PR:
- English Premier League fixtures. 45 x 150 mm
- English Premier League standings. 45 x 150 mm
